name: Quad Core
overview: It is time to get really puzzled in this brain-tingling puzzle game. The computer console brings out a series of cross-inverted lights. Your task is to eliminate all of the lights that are on the QC console, before the time runs out. Should you run out of time, you will lose one of your tries. If all of your tries have been lost. It is game over. The further your progress into the game, the more puzzling things will become. Quad Core 64 also consists of a level editor, in which you can create your very own challenging puzzles, and set time limits. The levels can be saved via disk or tape.
